alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Clarke, northern Oglethorpe and southeastern Madison Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Smithonia, or 8 miles south of Danielsville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Comer, Winterville, Colbert, Arnoldsville, Carlton, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Diamond Hill, Smithonia, Paoli, Dunlap, Watson Mill Bridge State Park, Vesta and Point Peter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
